attachments.title: GENUARY 2021
attachments.text: GENUARY 2021 is an artificially generated month of creative coding. 31 prompts for 31 days of making beautiful PROGRAMS / ALGORITHMS / MACHINES / AUTOMATONS.

messages.text: Sounds a bit like an art equivalent to AoC but with less strict rules. Could be quite fun to participate with some Julia art

elements.text: Sounds a bit like an art equivalent to AoC but with less strict rules. Could be quite fun to participate with some Julia art

messages.text: Sounds interesting! It also sounds somewhat like Ready Player One that I’m currently listening to on Audible.

elements.text: Sounds interesting! It also sounds somewhat like Ready Player One that I’m currently listening to on Audible.

messages.text: Now where can I get an Ontologically Anthropocentric Sensory Immersive Simulation console?  :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Now where can I get an Ontologically Anthropocentric Sensory Immersive Simulation console?

messages.text:
Anyone else into procedural 
art? I just found this virtual conference coming up at the end of April. Everything Procedural, tickets are 30€ and under <http://everythingprocedural.com|everythingprocedural.com>
And if anyone has also made anything procedural in Julia, please feel free to share here too

messages.text: Hello! I didn't know this channel existed! I am bringing in <@U7K185TUN> too :joy:

elements.text: Hello! I didn't know this channel existed! I am bringing in

messages.text:
Yes!! Let's get this channel going again. It'd be cool to share people's creations and discuss ideas/techniques. I got some smallish art things in Julia that I'd love to share with you all in time, maybe in a week or so

EDIT: I got a project mixing Blender rendering with Julia image processing. Also got a small Makie project. I'm hoping to also get into Luxor too!

elements.text:
Yes!! Let's get this channel going again. It'd be cool to share people's creations and discuss ideas/techniques. I got some smallish art things in Julia that I'd love to share with you all in time, maybe in a week or so

EDIT: I got a project mixing Blender rendering with Julia image processing. Also got a small Makie project. I'm hoping to also get into Luxor too!

messages.text: This Slack loses all message history  after about two weeks - so this is a great place to share stuff that you want to disappear after a short while! (which is probably why noone posts here :thinking_face:) I avoid the word "art" anyway ... :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing::rolling_on_the_floor_laughing::rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
